name: Kezan's Taint
tooltip:
Kezan's TaintLevel 60

Accept this talisman, <class>. Accept it and use its power to strike down our mutual enemies.

Know that around your neck you carry a piece of history. Kezan was once a grand territory of the Zandalar Empire. Alas, the taint of goblin trade princes would force out my proud brothers and sisters.

Kezan is now home to the goblin capital of the Undermine; but know that before the taint, it held greatness. Still to this day Kezan is considered sacred land to my people.
